articles.description: Andrew Lincoln's Rick Grimes and Danai Gurira's Michonne are reuniting for a new Walking Dead series. But where... and when?
articles.content: Now that AMC has announced a spin-off starring Andrew Lincoln as Rick Grimes and Danai Gurira as Michonne (the news dropped at The Walking Dead's San Diego Comic-Con panel), the question becomes wher… [+4522 chars]

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Star Trek teases Picard cast and Strange New Worlds crossover - The Verge
articles.description: Paramount Plus showed off a new trailer for the third and final season of Star Trek: Picard, giving us a glimpse at the legacy cast set to reprise their role.
articles.content: An (almost) complete look at the cast of Picards final season
